page.title: 12INDUSTRY 2
page.content: There are two large haulage firms covering the country and the continent. A building firm operates, a large plant firm offering cranes, diggers, bulldozers for hire or purchase, a coach firm, a building supplies unit _ all are here offering resources to the general growth of Ashford. There are two scrap_merchants who process rags and metal, one dealing with scrapped vehicles. Ashford is regarded as a growth town and should the Channel Tunnel be built it is this area which will be well suited to have support bases for the building and maintenance.
